Game.Name: 2 Games in 1 - Sonic Pinball Party + Columns Crown (Europe) (En,Ja,Fr,De,Es,It+En)
Game.plot: 2 Games In 1: Sonic Pinball Party / Columns Crown is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Various and published by Sega,which was released in Europe in 2006.Cheat: If you go into Ring Mode in every zone, after you beat the last zone, you will go into the true last stage with SuperSonic as the Character on the Board.
